content:
Plaza Inn DOHA

Plaza Inn Doha, your elegant business hotel offers a welcoming atmosphere with a rare blend of value and comfort. 

Its unique combination of traditional Arabian hospitality and contemporary design infuses warmth which appeals to the discerning guests.

Occupying a highly desirable location close to Qatar Islamic Museum, stunning Corniche, the traditional Souqs, various government offices and banks, also moments away from the airport makes it suitable for holiday or business stay.
